lines.text: You'll learn. Or you'll be up to your armpits in beef.
[Dempsey has just given Jeff Jimson a quick-draw and gun-twirling lesson]
Aw, Demps, when do I learn THAT?!
twirlin' a gun never saved a man's life. There's only one thing you gotta learn. (Pulls his gun and fires) Get it out fast! And then...put it...away...slow. Get what I mean, kid?
A maverick...a calf with no mother. No brand neither.
Oh, on account he was missing at roundup time. He outgrew his mother and wandered off. Sort of like you.

[after prodding by Dempsey in front of the lady owner, Jeff has shown he can't shoot]
You didn't have to make a fool out of me in front of her.
I didn't make a fool out of you, kid. You have to do that yourself.
